Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Stanforda
Reviews.Content: I am extremely satisfied with this phone. I bought as a replacement for my Galaxy S2 (which I messed up) and the features on this cheaper phone are only slightly less advanced than that of the Galaxy. Overall I would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent phone at a wonderful price.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Tony Ononye
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my son and he loves it. The only flaw he complained about is the battery life. He told me it's only got six hours of battery life. Other than that, everything else great.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: harley
Reviews.Content: Very nice condition as stated but Sprint could not activate the phone, they said it was blocked, the return authorization was handled very well and quickly.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok
Reviews.Author: terry massey
Reviews.Content: It is ok but thought it would be a better phone that it is, I have ha some problems , minior glitches . screen comes on sometimes all fuzzy.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Kellie A Cardenas
Reviews.Content: The phone was cheap, but I expected it to at least work.  After a few days it stopped taking charge, then it just wouldn't charge at all.  I contacted vendor's customer service by e-mail but never got a response.

Reviews.Title: OK cellphone
Reviews.Author: Ondrea Glover
Reviews.Content: Disappointment . Literally a get by phone.If you just need a temporary phone this would be perfect but of you looking for a permanent phone don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, especially for the money
Reviews.Author: Mike Reid
Reviews.Content: One complaint though.  The keys are tiny, which requires that texting become somewhat more "deliberate" than it is normally on other smartphones.

Reviews.Title: doing its job
Reviews.Author: Renada Nedrick "MsRenada"
Reviews.Content: this was a replacement phone for my kid ... yeah he is still asking for an iphone but tough caca on that one unless he buys it himself.... but its doing its job pretty good phone so far.

Reviews.Title: charger port/only sometimes will load internet
Reviews.Author: jonathan
Reviews.Content: changer port dont work no more have to use external wall charger and internet won't load all together this phone isnt good
